text: William James Holland (April 10, 1914 – February 26, 2000) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Warren Penns, Cleveland White Horses, and Detroit Eagles and averaged 5.2 points per game. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:2000 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Pennsylvania Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Cleveland White Horses players Category:Detroit Eagles players Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Edinboro Fighting Scots men's basketball players Category:Elmira Colonels (basketball) players Category:People from Greenville, Pennsylvania Category:Warren Penns players
title: Bill Holland (basketball)
